scripts.calibration:record: npm --workspace @fuji/engine-webgl run build && node scripts/run-calibration-harness.mjs --mode record
scripts.calibration:run: npm --workspace @fuji/engine-webgl run build && node scripts/run-calibration-harness.mjs --mode evaluate
scripts.calibration:dry-run: npm run calibration:record && npm run calibration:run
scripts.calibration:camera:run: npm --workspace @fuji/engine-webgl run build && node scripts/run-calibration-harness.mjs --mode evaluate --oracle-dir artifacts/calibration/oracle-camera-engine-v1 --oracle-index artifacts/calibration/oracle-camera-engine-v1/index.v1.json --require-oracle-source camera_engine
scripts.calibration:camera:baseline:check: npm --workspace @fuji/engine-webgl run build && node scripts/run-calibration-harness.mjs --mode evaluate --oracle-dir artifacts/calibration/oracle-camera-engine-v1 --oracle-index artifacts/calibration/oracle-camera-engine-v1/index.v1.json --require-oracle-source camera_engine --baseline-metrics calibration/baseline/metrics.camera_engine.v1.json
scripts.calibration:camera:baseline:refresh: npm run calibration:camera:run && npm run calibration:camera:baseline:lock
scripts.calibration:baseline:refresh: npm run calibration:dry-run && npm run calibration:baseline:lock
scripts.calibration:baseline:check: npm --workspace @fuji/engine-webgl run build && node scripts/run-calibration-harness.mjs --mode evaluate --baseline-metrics calibration/baseline/metrics.v1.json
scripts.test:acceptance: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
